definition: suitable for both the young and the old
to make learning fun/to combine education and entertainment
early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
